version_description: Bug fixes and general improvements
Bug fixes and general improvements

Yay! New updates for all our users:

- Included an agreement screen for new users to get tips on how to get the best experience
- Added a speed check aid to guide users to complete a survey accurately and smoothly
- Changed our contact us to a direct email for quicker response for our customer care team
- Added a rate our app link
- Other minor bug fixes and enhancements
- Most importantly, sprinkled some love and kindness after we took it out of the oven!
We are always making changes to improve the user experience for our users :)

New features

◉ Added a ‘pull to refresh’ feature for homepage and poll results page
◉ Removed ‘start survey button’ in the bottom navigation bar, click on the survey card on the home page to begin your survey!
◉ A new Survey Card on the homepage
◉ Revamped Poll Results page, all categories are now merged into one! Scroll through a unified Results page or filter by category to check out relevant Polls

We came, we saw, we improved it.

NEW SURVEY NOTIFICATIONS ARE HERE!
Turn on ‘Push Notifications’ on the More section to receive alerts whenever a new survey is available! If you don’t want to receive dingdings about new surveys that’s ok too, just toggle it off in the More section of our app.

Also now, your fingers get to do all the work for you. When you answer a ‘Poll’ from the home page, simply swipe the card to go back to the same place you left off and answer more questions!

We changed the titles for the home screen topics so if you didn’t understand the titles before, we promise you will now. Poll cards also got a whole new makeover - you might not even recognise her! (ok you probably will still recognise her)

Enjoy an eazy breezy browsing experience!

Becoming the best version of ourselves, for you.

We fixed some pesky bugs so you don’t have to kill them yourself.

Now you’ll never be stuck on an old version. We’ve added version checking which prompts you to download the newest (and always the greatest) version from the App Store.

If you thought milieu couldn’t get any better, you were wrong! (But don’t worry, so were we)

We’ve updated our Privacy Policy and our Terms of Use, check it out in the “Settings” tab! We’ve made both documents easier to read and understand because we know nobody has time for anything longer than a Baby Shark video these days.

In this update, we also fixed the problem where certain users experienced crashes while starting a survey. And you may or may not notice but we’ve optimized the app to improve your loading experience!

Compatible with iOS 12

If you thought milieu couldn’t get any better, you were wrong! (But don’t worry, so were we)
We’ve updated our Privacy Policy and our Terms of Use, check it out in the “Settings” tab! We’ve made both documents easier to read and understand because we know nobody has time for anything longer than a Baby Shark video these days.

In this update, we also fixed the problem where certain users experienced crashes while starting a survey. And you may or may not notice but we’ve optimized the app to improve your loading experience!

Compatible with iOS 12

Introducing a brand new Insights section!
A page just for you to browse infographics of surveys and polls. Sharing interesting results is now easier than ever! Hit the “SHARE” button to send infographics along to your friends or post it on social media.

Check out your points Ledger!

Your points history can now be displayed on a Ledger feature that’s found on the “More” tab. You can browse through all your bonus points and keep track of the points you’ve accumulated from each survey!

Roses are red, violets are blue,
An updated milieu, just for you!

What’s new:
Surveys are refreshed regularly so if you’ve recently had a child, gotten married or started working out, we want to know about it!

What’s new: Surveys are refreshed regularly so if you’ve recently had a child, gotten married or started working out, we want to know about it!

Someone spying on your Milieu Surveys app on the bus? Show off some new features! We got you!

•New FAQ section that answers all your burning questions
•New interface for rating questions

We’ve also squashed some pesky bugs so update now for the latest version!

Someone spying on your Milieu Surveys app on the bus? Show off some new features! We got you!

•New FAQ section that answers all your burning questions
•New interface for rating questions

We’ve also squashed some pesky bugs so update now for the latest version!

Like a fine wine, Milieu Surveys only gets better with time.

This new version brings you a better experience when you browse infographics, so you can stay updated with the latest community opinions.

We’ve also squashed pesky bugs in this update and included a feature for you to rate our app more easily! Enjoy!

Tada! We have a new update! We have improved overall performance and introduced a more dynamic way to display text. We have also introduced new question variations. TL:DR? Everything works better now. Enjoy!

Tada! We have a new update! We have improved overall performance and introduced a more dynamic way to display text. We have also introduced new question variations. TL:DR? Everything works better now. Enjoy

Like a fine wine, Milieu Surveys only gets better with time.

Update to the new version for the smoothest survey taking experience!

We’ve also squashed pesky bugs in this update so nothing ruins your day on Milieu Surveys!

We're always improving our app so you get the best Milieu Surveys experience!

In this update, we improved overall performance and introduced smoother loading to enhance your overall experience.

Taking surveys have never been more fun!
Faster, better, snazzier. We have made updates under the hood. Also killed some bugs along the way.

Faster, better, snazzier. We have made updates under the hood. Also killed some bugs along the way.
We looked around every nook and cranny to crush the nasty bugs and made some cool updates along the way. We think you might love it!

Ready for New Year, new me? We are!
We’ve tweaked things up to improve your Milieu experience:
- Less squint - images and videos are now bigger and clearer!
- Keep track of your points with an improved ledger page
- App crashed? We’ve added a ‘Restart’ button to keep things going for you while we work on the issue!
Update your Milieu Surveys app to version 1.8.6 for these cool updates!

Ready for New Year, new me? We are!
We’ve tweaked things up to improve your Milieu experience:
- Less squint - images and videos are now bigger and clearer!
- Keep track of your points with an improved ledger page
- App crashed? We’ve added a ‘Restart’ button to keep things going for you while we work on the issue!

We started out the new year by leaving behind some pesky bugs in 2019!
We’ve made some cool updates so that you have a smooth experience taking surveys.
Enjoy!

A little goes a long way!
We've made some minor tweaks to improve your experience on our app:
- CNY may be over but tidying never stops! Our app looks a little cleaner than before, yay!
- No more neck strain - removed auto-rotate for images
We took out some pesky bugs and made a few tiny tweaks here and there for a smoother experience!

Enjoying the ride with Milieu Surveys? Happy to say, it’ll only get smoother from here!

◉ Improved sign up process - get your friends to join the community!
◉ Less loading time, fewer annoying bugs
◉ Open links in-survey - no more wordy paragraphs!
We smoothed out bumps, took out some bugs, and brought in our new friends from Vietnam and the Philippines, hooray!
Safety first! We’ve added extra security features to protect your data. While at that, why not a few aesthetic enhancements here and there too?
Safety first! We’ve added extra security features to protect your data. While at that, why not a few aesthetic enhancements here and there too?
A few polishes here and there to keep things running smoothly!
A few polishes here and there to keep things running smoothly!

We've got you covered!
◉ Some devices faced scrolling issues - they're now working perfectly!
◉ We also made it easier for you to tell your friends and family about Milieu Surveys. Check out the updated sharing function under the "Refer A Friend" tab!
Now you see me, now you don’t! Some background work went on there to keep things running smoothly, bet you didn’t notice anything, right?

Don’t push our buttons! Just kidding. Images are now viewable alongside answer options, so you have one less button to tap!

Also, what did you have for lunch 2 days ago? Can’t recall? We can relate. If you’ve ever forgotten your Milieu account details and created a new one but got suspended instead, we now give you a nudge to jolt your memory! No more suspenseful *wink* wait to get your account back.

Chunky peanut butter? Yes. Chunky text paragraphs? Nah. We have added typographical emphasis like *bold* and /italics/ so you can read easier.

A new style of open-ended question may pop up here and there - it allows you to enter responses across multiple prompts, all in one page. Sweet!

Check out our new ranking display that now allows you to rank options all within one screen! We won’t ask you to rank your favourite BTS members… or should we?

We also made some security updates and bug fixes - all the (different kinds of) BTS stuff that keeps the app on tip-top condition!
